desc: The Bulk Cellar is based on the Fleurieu Peninsula, South Australia, and sells eco-friendly pantry, kitchen, bathroom, cleaning, DIY, pet and personal care products. Our goal is to refuse single use items, make simple switches and avoid plastic packing to reduce landfill. Local pick up and delivery available.

layout.text:
Based on the Fleurieu Peninsula,
Kaurna land, South Australia.
